entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being in a hurry for Quidditch practice.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: A wizard who gave up and slumped against the picture frame when asked to sign it.

entities.name: colin
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is eager to watch a Quidditch game and asks Harry for details about the sport.

relationships.description: Harry watched Lockhart give up and slump against the picture frame.
Colin scrambled through the portrait hole after Harry.
